item.title: Metropolis Algorithm Explained: Implementation & Intuition
item.author: ele.qiong@gmail.com (Qiongjie.X)
item.description: The Metropolis algorithm is the cornerstone of MCMC. We delve into its strategy for handling unnormalized densities, from the random walk mechanism to sampling 2D correlated Gaussians, complete with Python implementation and visual diagnostics.
